SAT 27 MAR 2010

Standard 6f Number of runners: 6

Cards help

£10,500 guaranteed For 3yo+ which have not won a Pattern race after 2008 Weights 3yo colts and geldings 8st 5lb; fillies 8st; 4yo+ colts and geldings 9st 4lb; fillies 8st 13lb Penalties after 2008, each Class 4 race won 3lb for each Class 3 race won 5lb for each Class 1 or 2 race won 7lb (handicaps excluded the purpose of penalties) (penalties cumulative and maximum penalty 12lb) Entries 14 pay £ 50 Penalty value 1st £6,542.55 2nd £1,959.30 3rd £979.65 4th £490.35 5th £244.65 6th £122.85
